sentences.en: A cleft chin is considered manly.
sentences.cn: 下巴上有沟痕的人被认为很有男子气概.
足球是一项激烈的体育运动.

sentences.en: For his shrunk shank and his big manly voice.
sentences.cn: 他缩小小腿,他的大男子气概的声音.

sentences.en: He behaved in a manly way for one so young.
sentences.cn: 他年纪虽小,作为却很有男子汉风度.

sentences.en: He laughed triumphantly, and silenced her by manly smothering.
sentences.cn: 他胜利地微笑着, 以男人咄咄逼人的气势使她哑口无言.

sentences.en: He must have written before he was yet five, an excellent, clear, manly hand of writing.
sentences.cn: 他在五岁以前就写得一手优美 、 清楚 、 老练如成人的好字.

sentences.en: He was the ideal of manly beauty.
sentences.cn: 他是理想中的有阳刚美的男人。

sentences.en: His manly beauty and more than common gracefulness were instantly the theme of general admiration.
sentences.cn: 他那男子气的美和出众的优雅风度马上成了大家赞扬的话题.

sentences.en: It was impossible not to admire his frank, manly faith.
sentences.cn: 对于他这种坦率 、 果断的信念,不得不感到钦佩.

sentences.en: My lord is all day making an exhibition of his manly strength.
sentences.cn: 我的男主人公整天显示着他男子汉的力气.

sentences.en: On the coldest nights Babbitt luxuriously gave up the duty of being manly.
sentences.cn: 天气最冷时,巴比特也不充好汉了.

sentences.en: She soon found out that of all manly dresses a shooting jacket was the most becoming.
sentences.cn: 她很快发现:在所有的男式服装中,猎装最为合适.

sentences.en: The boy walked with a confident manly stride.
sentences.cn: 这男孩以自信的男人步伐行走.

sentences.en: The boy walked with a manly stride.
sentences.cn: 那男孩走路迈着大人的步子.

sentences.en: This was a race of manly men , but insolent and impious.
sentences.cn: 这时的人类雄伟刚毅, 但却骄横不虔.

words.tran_cn: 勇敢的；果断的；有男子气概的
无人的；没有男子的；卑鄙的；残忍的
有男子气概的，像男人的；像人的（形容动物）
操纵；给…配置人员；使增强勇气；在…就位
大胆的,勇敢的,坚定的,高尚的

trans.tran_cn: 有男子气概的，适合男子的，强壮的
trans.tran_en: having qualities that people expect and admire in a man, such as being brave and strong
